snippet: With the plotline and dialogue written by imprisoned teenagers, a graphic novel aims to explain the disease in language youths can relate to.
abstract: Young men in a South Carolina state prison for juveniles and professors of library science from University of South Carolina have joined forces to fight AIDS with a graphic novel titled AIDS in the End Zone, aimed at teenagers.
lead_paragraph: With the plotline and dialogue written by imprisoned teenagers, a graphic novel aims to explain the disease in language youths can relate to.

headline.seo: Graphic Novel on H.I.V./AIDS Is Aimed at Southern Teenagers
headline.main: Graphic Novel Tackles H.I.V./AIDS in the South
headline.print_headline: Graphic Novel Tackles H.I.V./AIDS in the South
